text:
Henry Wilcoxon (8 September 1905 – 6 March 1984) was an Dominican-English silent movie actor. He was born in Roseau, Dominica. He was known for his role as Bishop Pickering in "Caddyshack". He is also known for appearing as a leading man in Cecil B. DeMille's movies.
Wilcoxon died in Los Angeles, California from cancer and heart failure, aged 78.
